languages.text: "У вас были друзья? Кто-то, с кем можно было просто поговорить, а не обсуждать очередную лекцию?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты росла одна, среди учителей и слуг? А как же друзья?"

languages.text: "Did you have friends? Someone you could turn to for a simple conversation, not a discussion of yet another lecture?"
languages.original_text: "У вас были друзья? Кто-то, с кем можно было просто поговорить, а не обсуждать очередную лекцию?"

traits.locale_text: "Did you have friends? Somebody you could simply chat with and not discuss yet another lecture?"
"Did you have friends? Somebody you could simply chat with and not discuss yet another lecture?"
"Did you have friends? Someone you could turn to for a simple conversation, not a discussion of yet another lecture?"
"Did you have friends? Someone you could turn to for a simple conversation, not a discussion of yet another lecture?"
"Did you have friends? Someone you could turn to for a simple conversation, not a discussion of yet another lecture?"

languages.text: “你有朋友吗？有没有那种不需要严肃地探讨知识，而是可以随便闲聊的人？”
languages.original_text: "Did you have friends? Someone you could turn to for a simple conversation, not a discussion of yet another lecture?"

traits.locale_text: “你有朋友吗？有没有那种不需要严肃地探讨知识，而是可以随便闲聊的人？”

languages.text: «¿Tenía amistades, alguien a quien recurrir para una simple conversación que no fuera un debate ni otra lección?».
languages.original_text: "Did you have friends? Someone you could turn to for a simple conversation, not a discussion of yet another lecture?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Tenía amistades, alguien a quien recurrir para una simple conversación que no fuera un debate ni otra lección?».

languages.text: 「お前に友人はいたのか？何かを教えるのではなく、簡単な会話をするうえで頼れる人はいたのか？」
languages.original_text: "Did you have friends? Someone you could turn to for a simple conversation, not a discussion of yet another lecture?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前に友人はいたのか？何かを教えるのではなく、簡単な会話をするうえで頼れる人はいたのか？」

languages.text: "Hattet Ihr Freunde? Jemanden, mit dem Ihr alltägliche Gespräche führen konntet, statt nur wieder über einen Vortrag zu debattieren?"
languages.original_text: "Did you have friends? Someone you could turn to for a simple conversation, not a discussion of yet another lecture?"

traits.locale_text: "Hattet Ihr Freunde? Jemanden, mit dem Ihr alltägliche Gespräche führen konntet, statt nur wieder über einen Vortrag zu debattieren?"

languages.text: « Aviez-vous des amis ? Des gens avec qui vous pouviez discuter ? Et pas du contenu de vos cours, mais de tout et n'importe quoi, en toute simplicité ? »
languages.original_text: "Did you have friends? Someone you could turn to for a simple conversation, not a discussion of yet another lecture?"

traits.locale_text: « Aviez-vous des amis ? Des gens avec qui vous pouviez discuter ? Et pas du contenu de vos cours, mais de tout et n'importe quoi, en toute simplicité ? »

languages.text: "Hiç arkadaşın var mıydı? Ders tartışmak için değil de iki lafın belini kırmak için konuşabileceğin kimsen yani?"
languages.original_text: "Did you have friends? Someone you could turn to for a simple conversation, not a discussion of yet another lecture?"

traits.locale_text: "Hiç arkadaşın var mıydı? Ders tartışmak için değil de, iki çift lafın belini kırmak için konuşabileceğin kimsen var mıydı?"
